entry.sense:
1. a country which
works together with another, especially
in a war (NOTE: The plural is allies.) 2.
someone who is willing to support you
in something you want to achieve
Jack has been my closest ally in the
campaign

except for Aside from a
minor infection, his health had been re-
markably good. I've got to read these
three articles, and that's aside from all
my regular work
